name: bobtech
title: Bob's Technology mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

Adds a Lab MK2
Adds Logistic science pack, and changes logistic based technologies to cost this new science pack.
If Alien artifacts are enabled from Bob's Enemies mod, an Alien lab and alien science packs are added, plus Science pack Gold made from Science packs 1, 2, 3 and Military.
Science pack ingredients are also changed around, to include some more Bob's Mods resources.

Although it can function as a stand alone mod, it is intended to be used with the full Bob's Mods set.
